parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets debriefing text for endType defined in [[Debriefing#Configuration|CfgDebriefing]].
<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is broken. https://feedback.bistudio.com/T85682 </value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> endType '''setDebriefingText''' [title, description]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> endType: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [title, description]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> title: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> description: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_currentObjective = ([[taskDescription]] ([[currentTask]] [[player]])) [[select]] 2;
"endDeath" [[setDebriefingText]] ["You Lose","All of your men were killed while assaulting the " + _currentObjective];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[debriefingText]], [[disableDebriefingStats]], [[enableDebriefingStats]]
</value></part></template>
